The deadline to submit your entry for the FTE EMEA Innovate Awards is this Friday! Don't miss the opportunity to be part of the regionâ€™s largest and most respected innovation competition at the epicentre of the upcoming FTE EMEA and Ancillary & Retailing events, co-located in Dublin on 11-13 June. The awards will celebrate the best air transport industry innovations from across Europe, Middle East and Africa. Industry stakeholders will pitch on-stage in an effort to impress our judges and audience, whose all-important votes will decide who wins. Whether youâ€™re an airline, airport, established vendor or startup, we want to hear from you. The three categories are: ğŸ† Best New CX Concept (open to vendors and startups only) ğŸ† Most Innovative Airline Initiative (open to airlines only) ğŸ† Most Innovative Airport Initiative (open to airports only) Don't miss this unparalleled opportunity to highlight your innovations, gain significant PR, and explore new business prospects. Click here to view the criteria and make your submission >> https://lnkd.in/eYdQNS8R

We are delighted to share that Dr. Geeta Nathan, Deputy Director of Innovation Ecosystems Strategy at Innovate UK, will be speaking at our upcoming National Chartered Director Conference. ğŸ“£ Geetaâ€™s key responsibility is to look across the innovation ecosystem to join up the key players to ensure Innovate UK and its partners are maximising impact on business innovation, with particular focus on how the ecosystems that supports early-stage science and technology start-ups and spin-outs. Join us on Thursday 13 June at Nissan, Sunderland, one of the UK's longstanding advanced manufacturing success stories, and witness first-hand how their pioneering investments have built factories of the future, transformed facilities, and upskilled its workforce. The Conference is open to all chartered directors and IoD members who are enrolled on the Certificate or Diploma in Company Direction and are on the journey to CDir. â­ Plus, we encourage CDirs to sponsor a director of tomorrow and bring a guest. Find out more and register here: â¡ https://lnkd.in/eFeHR2Aq ğŸŒŸ NOTES TO CONSIDER: There will be an evening reception at Malmaison hotel, Newcastle after the days event should you wish to join us. Return transport from central Newcastle will be provided, there is also ample parking on site at Nissan should you wish to drive direct. For those seeking accommodation for this event, special rates for Institute of Directors (IoD) delegates are available. #professionaldevelopment #networking #boardofdirectors #careergrowth #innovation #leadership #northeast #productivity

ğŸŒ Exciting News: Expanding our Global Reach ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¹ Consolidating a significant milestone for Just In Case through a new international journeyâ€¦ Portugal! This collaboration represents a profound commitment to fostering innovation, growth and determination in the global marketplace. We are proud to join forces with our esteemed Portuguese partners, Worten Portugal of the SONAE Group who together with Just In Case, will pave the way for new opportunities, expanding our horizons and expertise. Today, JUST IN CASE is partnered with major international companies that have believed in, identified and differentiated us from those that claim to share our product category. With unique business development formats, innovative processes and a focus not solely on the product but on the brand and what we makes us different, in just 3 years, Just In Case has grown and is now a proud, international company with a multi-million dollar net worth. This joint venture wouldnâ€™t have been possible without the dedication and hard work of our incredible teams on both sides, it's a pleasure to work beside such a committed team! For any interested parties, please don't hesitate to contact me to discuss potential development options. Gianantonio BannÃ² Andrea Bernabini Anton Zlotnik Miguel Franco Silva Francesca Tufanio Laura Vacondio Giorgia Modonesi Diego Ziliani #globalpartnership #internationalexpansion #jointventure

The countdown is officially on! We're just one week away from the highly anticipated 7th Annual Pricing Strategy World Summit and excitement is building! Get ready to join industry leaders, innovators, and visionaries from around the globe as we come together to explore the latest trends, strategies, and insights shaping our industry today. From engaging roundtables to inspiring presentations, this summit promises to be an event like no other. Some of the distinguished speakers joining us include: JosÃ© Vela, Beau Helbert, NoÃ«l Wang, Xavier Calero Molluna, JÃ¼rgen Liebert, Konstantin KÃ¶lsch, Jamie Boothroyd, Steffen Rohwer, Ji-Hoon Dierckx, Dmitrii Kovshov, RafaÅ‚ Janaczek, IvÃ¡n Navarro Siguero, Pedro Piccoli Soares, Gabor Kapus, Michel Safi, Daniel Meyer, Jean-Manuel Izaret (JMI), Bengi Turkel, Nazar Lukasevych, Fernando Ventureira, Dr. Yola Engler, MÃ¥rten Hedberg, Maja Perkovic, Agnes, Igor Mocevic, Debashis Kar, Holger Herbst, plus many moreâ€¦ Are you ready to elevate your knowledge, expand your network, and be part of the conversation shaping the future of our industry? Don't miss out! Secure your spot today and join us at the 7th Annual Pricing Strategy World Summit next week! ğŸ“†ğŸ’¡ Visit the website to download the brochure and register: pricingworld.ardensi.com Platinum Partners: Zilliant, PricingOne Gold Partners: Boston Consulting Group (BCG), Syncron, Stratence Partners Silver Partner: PROS, Minderest, Revenue.ai For sponsorship inquiries contact Vaishali Popat at vaishali.popat@ardensi.com For ticket inquiries, contact Aqsa Kiran Khan at aqsa.khan@ardensi.com For speaking inquiries, contact Christopher Mitchell at christopher.mitchell@ardensi.com #pricingstrategy #pricingoptimization #pricinganalysis #pricingexcellence
